review: I own and love a FireTV box for my home. I purchased the FireStick for my TV at work so I could stream MLB games while working. Great idea turned into a bad idea by a bad device released to the public too soon. I wanted to like it, I wanted to use it, but it is far too frustrating. Do not waste your money on this until they figure out a way to let it stream continuously. It is constantly freezing and buffering to the point it is worthless. It is always telling me I do not have the bandwidth to stream HD. You don't know me but trust me I do have the bandwidth (Small office staff, few wifi devices running, fiber optic cable internet, etc.). A coworker has the Roku stick for his TV and streams MLB games just fine with no issues with the wifi conection. Looks like I'll be getting a Roku.
author: D. J. Leonard
